name: Museum of Other Realities
description:
A new space for a new kind of culture. The Museum of Other Realities is an immersive art showcase.A New Frontier for Art
Step into a painting, surround yourself with fantastic sounds, experience art as it evolves and takes form. The museum contains a cross section of the free-ranging experimentation present in the relatively new medium of virtual reality art.Building a Community
Hang out with friends and enjoy a collective experience with new people. We hold regular events, celebrating and fostering a community around this new medium.Supporting ArtistsEvery artist featuring their work in the Museum is paid and promoted.
